Cameron Pass: A. Olsen - Pit Tech, J. Nelson - Scribe

Deep snowpack, clouds breaking briefly, light snow. IB: Snow accumulation exceeded the size of the SWE tube. Depth and density measurements were taken with the 1000cc wedge cutter. HN = 90cm, but density was only measured for 80cm of the new snow profile, so SWE calculations are only for 80cm of new snow on board.

Small density cutter used for measurements from 27-7cm due to
vegetation encroachment at base of snowpack and unconsolidated depth
hoar.
